resources.post: In the gospel of John ; it tells the story of what Jesus had on him when he was placed in the tomb and what Simon Peter saw when he entered the tomb after his resurrection.Chapter 20 : 6 and 7 states that a small napkin or face cloth was about his head ; and Peter saw it separate on the floor away from the rest of the other linens; which the Jewish people would use strips of linen ; rather than a shroud.
